title: Custom Embed
description: You can also use custom embed code
embed: <iframe src='https://player.vimeo.com/video/YOUR_VIDEO_ID' width='640' height='360' frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' allowfullscreen></iframe>
